attributes.action: Stop wasting money on Dale Farm!
attributes.additional_details:
So Dale Farm is going to be cleared, at a cost of £18M, just to prove a point that the law works. Wasting £18M doesn't seem like it's proving the law works.

I can't ever see this land being a lush green field again, and even before they moved in, it was a scrap yard anyway. It looks so much better now than it did then!

Yes, they don't pay taxes, so why waste another £18M on them. Seems a complete waste of our money.
